member.name: F:S3Lite.ApiObjects.ErrorCode.BucketAlreadyExists
member.summary: The requested bucket name is not available. The bucket namespace is shared by all users of the system. Please select a different name and try again.

member.summary: The bucket you tried to create already exists, and you own it.

member.name: F:S3Lite.ApiObjects.ErrorCode.BucketNotEmpty
member.summary: The bucket you tried to delete is not empty.

member.summary: This request does not support credentials.

member.name: F:S3Lite.ApiObjects.ErrorCode.CrossLocationLoggingProhibited
member.summary: Cross-location logging not allowed. Buckets in one geographic location cannot log information to a bucket in another location.

member.summary: Your proposed upload is smaller than the minimum allowed object size.

member.summary: Your proposed upload exceeds the maximum allowed object size.

member.summary: Inline data exceeds the maximum allowed size.

member.name: P:S3Lite.S3Client.AccessKey
member.summary: Access key, generally a base64-encoded string. When null or empty, anonymous access mode is used (no request signing).

member.name: P:S3Lite.S3Client.SecretKey
member.summary: Secret access key, generally a base64-encoded string. When null or empty, anonymous access mode is used (no request signing).

member.name: P:S3Lite.S3Client.HasCredentials
member.summary: Boolean indicating whether credentials are configured. When false, anonymous access mode is used (no request signing).

member.summary: Request style. Default is virtual hosted style.

member.summary: Specify the secret key. Pass null or empty string to use anonymous access mode.
